alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 8:55AM CST until February 18 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Jacks Fork River Basin...including Alley Spring, Eminence... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Jacks Fork at Alley Spring. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, water impacts Alley Spring Campground. Water is one foot in depth at the 600, 800 and 900 loop camp sites. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 2.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 9.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 900 AM CST.
